    url = Get('url') + '/morechapter,{"body":"id=' + baseUrl.replace(/^.*\/(.*)\/$/,'$1') + '","method":"POST"}';
    list1 = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data;
    for (i in list1) {
        title = list1[i].chaptername;
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\så…±.*?å›¾/, '').replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ](|\s)ç¬¬.*?[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ]/, '$1').replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*ç¬¬.*(\d+).*?[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        data.push({
            'title': title,
            'link': baseUrl + list1[i].chapterid + '.html,{"webView":true}'
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data.reverse());
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    var body = 'k=' + java.encodeURI(e);
    return Get('url') + '/s,{"body":"' + body + '","method":"POST"}';
}(key));
</js>
